attributes.action: Stop Airports charging to drop off, or pick up passengers. Within first 15 min
attributes.additional_details: Airports charge minimum £6 to pick up or drop of passengers, raising extortionately if you stay longer.  Generally the driver is only on site a few minutes yet the charge is grotesquely over priced
attributes.background: Legislate that airports cannot charge for the first 15 minutes when dropping off or picking up passengers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724381
